ground_truth: They're in the gym, where Jacob does push-ups on a handstand. They're in a sauna, and Cal passes out into Jacob's crotch. At the busy bar, Jacob and Cal are at the bar, and Cal taps his empty glass as Jacob frowns at him. Cal looks, and Jacob tweaks his nose. Cal eyes his wedding ring, then slips it off. They walk through the bar, Jacob saunters away, and Cal sits down next to a pretty woman, around 40. He eyes her intently, the waitress leaves, Cal bites his lip, winks at her, and takes a drink. Back at Cal's apartment, they snog passionately in the dim light. She takes off his jacket, kisses him, draws back abruptly, pushes him onto the couch, puts her leg up on the sofa, and leaps on him and straddles him. The next morning, he shows her out of the apartment, Kate's hair is disheveled, they kiss, she leaves, and Cal closes the door. He eyes an attractive young brunette woman, talks to a pretty petite woman at the bar, and another young woman shows him her ring. At a table, he talks to yet another beautiful woman. Smartly dressed in different suits, Cal talks to women over a series of nights. In various places throughout the bar, Cal talks to lots of different women. Cal heads out hand-in-hand with an attractive young woman in a slinky green dress. At the bar, Jacob smirks and rubs his head, and Cal and Jacob drink at the bar. Liz sits at the bar, she's on her mobile. Jessica is home, and at school, Jessica takes books out of her locker. She peeks out from behind her locker door at a girl of her own age with long blonde hair. The girl heads off down the corridor, and Jessica stalks after her, jogging around a corner where the girl is waiting for her and claps her hands together like flippers. Madison heads out, and as she opens the door, light streams across Jessica's face. The kids glance over at something, and some have stopped to stare. Outside, there's a red curtain set out in the middle of a yard with a crowd gathered around it. Jessica and her friends approach the curtain, it drops, and Robbie stands on a platform behind it. Jessica drops her tray, he stares at her, Robbie looks at her gravely, she walks off, Robbie watches her with sad eyes, lets out a big sigh, and trudges back into school. Bright sunlight filters through the trees in Emily's garden where the hedge is snipped with a large pair of shears, the rose bush is pruned with a pair of clippers, and somebody mows the grass as Emily watches from the porch with a smile.

Cal gazes at his wedding band, then removes it. They stroll through the tavern, Jacob struts away, and Cal settles down next to an attractive lady, about 40. He gazes at her keenly, the server departs, Cal bites his lip, winks at her, and sips a beverage. Back at Cal's flat, they kiss passionately in the dim glow. She removes his coat, kisses him, recoils suddenly, pushes him onto the sofa, puts her leg up on the couch, and jumps on him and mounts him. The next dawn, he shows her out of the flat, Kate's hair is tousled, they kiss, she departs, and Cal shuts the door. Elegantly dressed in various outfits, Cal converses with women over a succession of evenings. In assorted spots throughout the tavern, Cal converses with numerous different women. Cal departs hand-in-hand with an attractive young woman in a sleek green outfit. At the counter, Jacob grins and rubs his head, and Cal and Jacob imbibe at the counter. Liz sits at the counter, she's on her phone. Jessica is home, and at school, Jessica retrieves books out of her locker. She peeks out from behind her locker door at a girl of her own age with long blonde locks. The girl heads off down the hallway, and Jessica trails after her, jogging around a corner where the girl is waiting for her and claps her hands together like flippers. Madison departs, and as she opens the door, light streams across Jessica's face. The children glance over at something, and some have halted to gape. Outside, there's a crimson drape set out in the middle of a yard with a crowd gathered around it. Jessica and her companions approach the drape, it descends, and Robbie stands on a platform behind it. Jessica drops her tray, he gazes at her, Robbie looks at her gravely, she strides off, Robbie observes her with sorrowful eyes, lets out a big sigh, and trudges back into school. test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
In the bustling environment of the gym, Jacob is seen performing push-ups while maintaining a handstand, showcasing his impressive strength and balance. Meanwhile, in the steamy confines of the sauna, an unexpected incident occurs when Cal suddenly loses consciousness, collapsing awkwardly into Jacob's lap. Later, at the lively and crowded bar, Jacob and Cal find themselves seated at the counter. Cal, with a hint of impatience, taps his empty glass, prompting Jacob to frown disapprovingly at him. Cal, feeling the weight of his wedding ring, glances at it thoughtfully before deciding to slip it off his finger. As they make their way through the bustling bar, Jacob saunters off confidently, leaving Cal to sit down beside an attractive woman who appears to be around forty years old. He gazes at her with keen interest, and after the waitress departs, Cal bites his lip, winks at the woman, and takes a sip of his drink.

Back at Cal's dimly lit apartment, the atmosphere is charged with passion as they engage in a fervent kiss. She removes his jacket with a swift motion, kisses him again, then suddenly pulls back, pushing him onto the couch. With a playful yet assertive move, she places her leg on the sofa and leaps onto him, straddling him with enthusiasm. The following morning, Cal escorts her out of the apartment. Her hair is slightly tousled, and they share a parting kiss before she departs, leaving Cal to close the door behind her. His attention is soon captured by an attractive young brunette woman, and he engages in conversation with a charming petite woman at the bar. Another young woman approaches him, showing off her ring. Seated at a table, he converses with yet another beautiful woman. Over a series of nights, Cal, dressed smartly in various suits, is seen talking to numerous women in different areas of the bar. Eventually, Cal exits the bar hand-in-hand with a striking young woman wearing a slinky green dress. Meanwhile, Jacob, with a smirk on his face, rubs his head as he and Cal enjoy drinks at the bar. Liz is also present, sitting at the bar and engrossed in her mobile phone.

Elsewhere, Jessica is at home, and later at school, she retrieves books from her locker. She peeks out from behind the locker door, observing a girl of her own age with long, flowing blonde hair. As the girl walks down the corridor, Jessica follows her, jogging around a corner where the girl is waiting, clapping her hands together playfully like flippers. Madison makes her exit, and as she opens the door, a stream of light illuminates Jessica's face. The kids around them glance over at something, some pausing to stare. Outside, a red curtain is set up in the middle of a yard, drawing a crowd around it. Jessica and her friends approach the curtain, which suddenly drops to reveal Robbie standing on a platform behind it. In surprise, Jessica drops her tray, and Robbie gazes at her with a serious expression. As she walks away, Robbie watches her with sad eyes, lets out a deep sigh, and slowly makes his way back into the school building.

In Emily's garden, bright sunlight filters through the trees, casting a warm glow over the scene. The hedge is being meticulously trimmed with a large pair of shears, while the rose bush is carefully pruned with a pair of clippers. Meanwhile, someone is diligently mowing the grass, and Emily observes the activity from the porch with a contented smile on her face.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
In the vibrant and bustling atmosphere of the gym, Jacob is prominently featured executing push-ups while adeptly maintaining a steady handstand, a remarkable feat that showcases his impressive physical strength and exceptional balance. Meanwhile, within the steamy and confined space of the sauna, an unexpected incident unfolds as Cal suddenly loses consciousness, collapsing awkwardly and landing directly into Jacob's lap. Later on, in the lively, crowded, and energetic bar, Jacob and Cal find themselves seated comfortably at the counter. Cal, feeling the weight and significance of his wedding ring, glances down at it thoughtfully before making the decision to slip it off his finger. As they navigate their way through the bustling bar scene, Jacob confidently saunters off, leaving Cal to settle beside an attractive woman who appears to be approximately forty years old. He gazes at her with keen and undeniable interest, and after the waitress departs, Cal bites his lip, winks at the woman, and takes a leisurely sip of his drink.

Transitioning back to Cal's dimly lit apartment, the atmosphere is charged with palpable passion as they engage in a fervent and intense kiss. She removes his jacket with a swift, fluid motion, kisses him once again, then suddenly pulls back, pushing him playfully onto the couch. With a playful yet assertive move, she places her leg on the sofa and energetically leaps onto him, straddling him with visible enthusiasm. The following morning, Cal escorts her out of his apartment. Her hair is slightly tousled, and they share a parting kiss before she departs, leaving Cal to close the door firmly behind her. His attention is soon drawn and captivated by the presence of an attractive young brunette woman, and he engages in conversation with a charming petite woman at the bar. Meanwhile, another young woman approaches him, showing off her sparkling ring. Seated comfortably at a table, he converses with yet another beautiful woman, further adding to his social interactions. Over the course of several nights, Cal, dressed smartly in various elegantly tailored suits, is seen conversing with numerous women in different areas of the bustling bar. Eventually, Cal exits the bar hand-in-hand with a striking young woman adorned in a slinky green dress. Meanwhile, Jacob, with a playful smirk on his face, gently rubs his head as he and Cal enjoy their drinks at the lively bar. Liz is also present, sitting at the bar and deeply engrossed in her mobile phone.

In a different setting, Jessica is at home, and later at school, she retrieves various books from her locker. She peeks out cautiously from behind the locker door, observing a girl of her own age with long, flowing blonde hair. As the girl walks gracefully down the corridor, Jessica follows her, jogging quickly around a corner where the girl is waiting expectantly, playfully clapping her hands together like flippers. Madison makes her exit, and as she opens the door, a stream of bright light illuminates Jessica's face dramatically. The kids around them glance over, some pausing in their tracks to stare intently. Outside, a vibrant red curtain is set up conspicuously in the middle of a yard, drawing a curious crowd around it. Jessica and her friends approach the intriguing curtain, which unexpectedly drops to reveal Robbie standing confidently on a platform behind it. In surprise, Jessica drops her tray clumsily, and Robbie gazes at her with a serious, unwavering expression. As she walks away, Robbie watches her with sad, longing eyes, lets out a deep, resigned sigh, and slowly makes his way back into the school building, reflecting on the moment.

In Emily's beautiful garden, the bright and warm sunlight filters gently through the trees, casting a radiant glow over the serene scene. The lush hedge is being meticulously trimmed with a large pair of precise shears, while the delicate rose bush is carefully pruned with a sharp pair of clippers. Meanwhile, someone is diligently mowing the grass, maintaining its neat appearance, and Emily observes the bustling activity from the comfort of the porch with a contented, satisfied smile on her face, appreciating the tranquil beauty of her surroundings.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Inside the gym, Jacob positions himself into a handstand, carefully balancing his weight on his hands, and begins to perform push-ups, his muscles straining with each controlled movement. In the sauna, the heat envelops them, and Cal, overwhelmed by the warmth, suddenly loses consciousness, collapsing forward into Jacob's crotch. Later, at the bustling bar, Jacob and Cal stand at the counter, where Cal, feeling the weight of his empty glass, taps it lightly to signal for more, while Jacob, noticing this, frowns in disapproval. Cal's gaze shifts to his wedding ring, contemplating its significance before he discreetly slides it off his finger. They navigate through the crowded bar, with Jacob sauntering away confidently, leaving Cal to settle next to an attractive woman in her forties. He fixes his gaze on her, studying her features intently as the waitress departs. Cal, feeling a surge of confidence, bites his lip, winks at the woman, and takes a sip of his drink. Back at Cal's dimly lit apartment, he and the woman engage in a passionate kiss, their lips meeting fervently. She removes his jacket with a swift motion, kisses him again, then suddenly pulls back, pushing him onto the couch. With a playful leap, she positions herself over him, straddling him with a teasing smile. The following morning, Cal escorts her to the door, her hair tousled from the night's events. They share a lingering kiss before she steps out, and Cal closes the door behind her. His attention is soon captured by an attractive young brunette woman, and he engages in conversation with a petite woman at the bar, while another young woman shows him her ring, sparking a brief exchange. Seated at a table, he converses with yet another beautiful woman, each interaction marked by his charm. Over several nights, Cal, dressed sharply in various suits, continues to engage with numerous women throughout the bar, his social prowess on display. Eventually, he leaves hand-in-hand with a striking young woman in a slinky green dress. Meanwhile, at the bar, Jacob observes with a smirk, rubbing his head in amusement as he and Cal share drinks. Liz sits at the bar, absorbed in her mobile phone. At home, Jessica is seen, and at school, she retrieves books from her locker, peeking out from behind the door at a girl her age with long blonde hair. As the girl walks down the corridor, Jessica follows, jogging around a corner to find the girl waiting, who playfully claps her hands together like flippers. Madison exits, and as she opens the door, a stream of light illuminates Jessica's face. The kids around them glance over, some pausing to stare. Outside, a red curtain is set up in the middle of a yard, drawing a crowd. Jessica and her friends approach as the curtain drops, revealing Robbie standing on a platform. Jessica, startled, drops her tray, while Robbie meets her gaze with a serious expression. She walks away, and Robbie watches her retreat with sad eyes, releasing a heavy sigh before trudging back into the school. In Emily's garden, bright sunlight filters through the trees as someone skillfully snips the hedge with large shears, prunes the rose bush with clippers, and mows the grass, all under Emily's watchful eye as she smiles from the porch.

As the curtain drops, revealing Robbie on a platform, Jessica drops her tray and walks away, leaving Robbie to watch her with a sigh before returning to school. test_cases.description: They're in the gym, a state-of-the-art facility known for its extensive fitness programs, where Jacob, an experienced gymnast, does push-ups on a handstand. They're in a sauna, heated to a typical 90-100°C, and Cal, overwhelmed by the heat, passes out into Jacob's crotch. At the busy bar, a local hotspot popular for its eclectic mix of patrons, Jacob and Cal are at the bar, and Cal taps his empty glass as Jacob, who is known for being frugal, frowns at him. Cal looks, and Jacob tweaks his nose, a playful habit from their college days. Cal eyes his wedding ring, a simple gold band symbolizing his five-year marriage, then slips it off. They walk through the bar, Jacob saunters away with the easy confidence of someone who knows the place well, and Cal sits down next to a pretty woman, around 40, who is known for her vibrant storytelling. He eyes her intently, the waitress leaves having noted his order for a classic gin and tonic, Cal bites his lip, winks at her, and takes a drink. Back at Cal's apartment, a modern space with minimalist decor, they snog passionately in the dim light. She takes off his jacket, kisses him, draws back abruptly, pushes him onto the couch, puts her leg up on the sofa, and leaps on him and straddles him. The next morning, he shows her out of the apartment, Kate's hair is disheveled from a restless night, they kiss, she leaves, and Cal closes the door. He eyes an attractive young brunette woman, part of the morning rush crowd, talks to a pretty petite woman at the bar, and another young woman shows him her ring, a striking sapphire that catches his eye. At a table, he talks to yet another beautiful woman, their laughter reverberating in the ambient chatter of the bar. Smartly dressed in different suits purchased from a high-end tailor, Cal talks to women over a series of nights. In various places throughout the bar, a favorite venue known for its lively atmosphere, Cal talks to lots of different women. Cal heads out hand-in-hand with an attractive young woman in a slinky green dress that turns heads. At the bar, Jacob smirks, an expression often seen when he wins a bet, and rubs his head, and Cal and Jacob drink at the bar. Liz sits at the bar, she's on her mobile, likely arranging tomorrow's business meetings. Jessica is home, and at school, a renowned institution for its academic excellence, Jessica takes books out of her locker. She peeks out from behind her locker door at a girl of her own age with long blonde hair, who is known for her participation in the school’s drama club. The girl heads off down the corridor, and Jessica stalks after her, jogging around a corner where the girl is waiting for her and claps her hands together like flippers, mimicking a scene from a popular viral video. Madison heads out, and as she opens the door, light streams across Jessica's face, casting a warm glow. The kids glance over at something, and some have stopped to stare at the spectacle unfolding. Outside, there's a red curtain, reminiscent of theatrical performances, set out in the middle of a yard with a crowd gathered around it. Jessica and her friends approach the curtain, it drops, and Robbie, a well-known class clown, stands on a platform behind it. Jessica drops her tray, startled by the unexpected scene, he stares at her, Robbie looks at her gravely, a departure from his usual jovial demeanor, she walks off, Robbie watches her with sad eyes, lets out a big sigh, and trudges back into school. Bright sunlight filters through the trees in Emily's garden, a small but beautifully maintained space, where the hedge is snipped with a large pair of shears, the rose bush is pruned with a pair of clippers known for their precision, and somebody mows the grass as Emily watches from the porch with a smile, enjoying the peaceful morning.

Smartly dressed in different suits. Cal talks to women over a series of nights. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In various places throughout the bar Cal talks to lots of different women. Cal heads out handinhand with an attractive young woman in a slinky green dress. At the bar Jacob smirks and rubs his head and Cal and Jacob drink at the bar. Liz sits at the bar. she is on her mobile. Jessica is home and at school. Jessica takes books out of her locker. She peeks out from behind her locker door at a girl of her own age with long blonde hair. The girl heads off down the corridor and Jessica stalks after her jogging around a corner where the girl is waiting for her and claps her hands together like flippers. Madison heads out and as she opens the door light streams across Jessica's face. The kids glance over at something and some have stopped to stare. Outside there is a red curtain set out in the middle of a yard with a crowd gathered around it. Jessica and her friends approach the curtain. it drops and Robbie stands on a platform behind it. Jessica drops her tray. he stares at her. Robbie looks at her gravely. she walks off. Robbie watches her with sad eyes. let us out a big sigh and trudges back into school. Bright sunlight filters through the trees in Emily's garden where the hedge is snipped with a large pair of shears. the rose bush is pruned with a pair of clippers and somebody mows the grass as Emily watches from the porch with a smile.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Jacob and Cal are in the gym, with Jacob doing handstand push-ups. In a sauna, Cal faints into Jacob's lap. At a bar, Cal removes his wedding ring and flirts with a woman, leading to a passionate night in his apartment. The next morning, he escorts her out, then continues to meet various women at the bar, engaging with them over time. Meanwhile, Jessica, at school, follows a girl, Madison, who playfully claps her hands like flippers. Outside, a red curtain reveals Robbie on a platform, and a somber moment occurs as Jessica drops her tray, walks away, and Robbie watches her sadly. In Emily's garden, she smiles as the garden is tended, with sunlight filtering through the trees.
